CustomField.description:
If the nego scope is not the whole supplier (Is_all is negative) and not the All Brands (Is_all_brands negative).
This detail that any new Brand coming for the supplier will be included by default in this nego scope.
If no, and the user want to include one new brand in this scope, he will have the select manually the new brand in the scope to include it.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Préciser si les futures Marques liées au fournisseur doivent être automatiquement incluses dans ce périmètre de négociation.
CustomField.label: Include New Brand
